message: Module error while trying to sync data and config with repo: git command failed: Command '['git', 'add', '.']' returned non-zero exit status 128. (CalledProcessError).

Module error while trying to initialize heating control: failed to interact with node 'system' via get: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='kazanfutes-71b78-default-rtdb.europe-west1.firebasedatabase.app', port=443): Max retries exceeded with url: /system/.json (Caused by SSLError(SSLZeroReturnError(6, 'TLS/SSL connection has been closed (EOF) (_ssl.c:992)'))) (SSLError).
